Reviews.Title: “You get what you expect”

Reviews.Content: looking hotel night cheap found hotel close headed evening reviewed reviews hotel wasnt hotel anyways value cost 70s movie hotel updated bathroom exactly expected based reviews received time bad nice pool center parking site overall cheap los angeles stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice basic hotel, with updated bathroom!”

Reviews.Content: day la found ourselves exhausted drive home stay ramada wilshire center vacancies drove little bit stumbled dunes inn location relatively close theater walking distance residential quiet safe safe mean entrance manned watchful clerk vagrants nearby expensive condos houses churches feel comfortable walking block streets dark bed comfortable luxurious tv fine bathroom recently renovated impeccably clean nice granite countertop tilework refrigerator pool atrium wifi kitchen didnt cant comment didnt pay price deal parking free greatly appreciated neighborhood walking distance restaurants night life etc youd visit car note nearby visit car charming larchmont village koreatown griffith park observatory lacma summarize dunes inn wilshire travelodge fancier cleaner bathroom wed definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Ugh! awful! too bad because the Dunesuse to be decent!”

Reviews.Content: stay dunes trip la late 90s 2004 im sad hotel gone dogs pet stay absolutely appalled getting worse locked due result card charged staying night initially stay 3 nights slept clothes including shoes carpet omg sticky shoes simply pleasant property date maybe time im 50 majestic property tired tacky tasteless highly recommend wilshire plaza ramada street
